article_title: Rigor Mortis/Warbeast Singer Bruce Corbitt Undergoes Heart Surgery

To report any abusive, obscene, defamatory, racist, homophobic or threatening comments, or anything that may violate any applicable laws, please send an e-mail to blabbermouthinbox(@)gmail.com with pertinent details.
